ET.description: Researching the specific part, automotive, and computational system used by the vehicle is required

SE.description: General knowledge of automotive and computational systems is required. Additional knowledge about the specific part is also required

KoIC.description: Detailed knowledge about the vehicle's control systems is required

Eq.description: Non-OEM equipment is required, but not always chosen by the attacker

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to extract sensitive data or information from a vehicle through the attack surface of aftermarket, customer, or dealer equipment

ET.description: Cellular communication protocols and weaknesses are documented, but the specific implementation within the vehicle must be researched

SE.description: Knowledge about automotive and cellular communication systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls may be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest and extract cellular communication data from the vehicle

ET.description: Internet protocol documentation is widely available, including exploits and weaknesses

SE.description: Knowledge of internet communication protocols is required

KoIC.description: Knowledge about controls used by the vehicle (such as firewalls) are required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required, or a standard computer may be the only equipment necessary

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest and extract sensitive information pertaining the internet communication of the vehicle

ET.description: Removable media is typically non-proprietary. With documentation and known weaknesses and exploits easily researchable

SE.description: Knowledge of different removable media devices and their exploits is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls is required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest and extract sensitive information found on removable media within a vehicle

ET.description: Short range protocol documentation is widely available. Including potential weaknesses and exploits

SE.description: Knowledge of short range communication protocols is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls is required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: an attack designed to harvest and extract sensitive information found within the short range wireless communication of a vehicle

ET.description: Research is required to find where that data is stored locally, and the ideal attack surface to achieve the extraction

SE.description: Knowledge of automotive and cryptographic systems is required

KoIC.description: Detailed information about the vehicle's control systems is required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest and extract sensitive information concerning the cryptographic protocols used by the vehicle
